Class ValidateMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.AbstractReportMojo
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.AbstractReportMojoEx
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.ValidateMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo, MavenMultiPageReport, MavenReport
@Mojo(name="validate") public class ValidateMojo extends AbstractReportMojoEx
Generates a tag library validation report.
Author:
Fabrizio Giustina
